alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 11:41PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT FLAGLER...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS AND EAST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM EST... At 1141 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Saint Augustine Beach to near Pomona Park. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, and Crescent Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
